website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a unique case for your S6, chances are you will find this model's card holder and protective features very useful — provided you have the patience to operate the door.
pros: A nice case with a handy card holder compartment
cons: Sliding door of card compartment is difficult to operate

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE these cases
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE these cases! I have bought 2 so far. The rose gold one is exactly that. I was a little hesitant to order the turquoise one because I didnt want it to be more green than anything but I love it. Personally it isn't really turquoise its a pretty mint color. Which I love the color. I've seen several reviews say that the card holder is hard to open but I haven't really had that problem. It holds the two cards, plus a couple bills easily. I havent had a single problem with this phone case. I will definitely purchase again for myself and family members.
customer_reviews.author: dragonmisty52

customer_reviews.title: Genius case!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a purse/handbag type of woman and after buying this case, I wont go back to any other case again! The sliding door is a little stiff at first but gets easier with use. It did become a little too loose after over a year of using it, but that may be because I fit 3 cards in it instead of 2. LOL I can't tell you how many times I've dropped my phone and even the case shows minimal damage. A must buy for the minimalists!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty sturdy. I can only fit 2 cards
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty sturdy. I can only fit 2 cards. i tried 3 but the plastic part was separating from the rubber part when I did, so I had to take it out. It works fine for me because I usually only need to carry my license and my debit cart.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like how easy it goes on my phone but dislike ...
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it goes on my phone but dislike how difficult it is to open the card slot in the back. It doesnt just slide open and i feel like it will break soon with how hard i have to put pressure to open it.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: It's quite literally a hostage situation. Run.
customer_reviews.text: So, you need a knife to break into this thing. If you always have a knife in your pocket to open it, sure order. If not, save your money. I've yet to put anything in it as I know we'll end up with a hostage situation. Can you imagine being out and NOT being able to get to any of your cards? I've scratched the back with my keys prying at it trying to get it loose enough to open easily without tools. Yeah, you need TOOLS.
customer_reviews.author: Nella

customer_reviews.title: Please don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: I gave an almost brand new S6 to my daughter for going back and forth to school and she asked for this case so she could store her bus pass and school ID in it. As many have stated the ID compartment is hard to hold. My daughter came to me and showed me that while the phone fit in this case just fine the power button didn't line up at all. I couldn't send it back so we just tossed it in the trash. Complete waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Ragenasian

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Read several reviews on this case, glad I did not listen to most of them. Was worried maybe they had made it cheaper. Had this case previously and it was a wonderful case then and it is now as well. The only reason I bought a new one was not because it stopped working properly, I just wanted a different color. Love having my ID and credit card so handy so I do not have to take my purse into store all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ava Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good item, better than reviews indicate (for my situation)
customer_reviews.text: Used this for almost 1 year now. Yes, the back is tight and can be difficult to open. That's a +plus+ for me because I don't want my cards falling out accidentally. It's tough but I am pretty careful with my phone- not subjecting it to heavy abuse. The case fits my S6 very snugly - all the buttons work properly and the mic/speakers/led's/cameras all work properly. I'm pleased with it. It's not high-end, fancy, ultra-durable but suits my taste.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchased this cell phone case. It is so handy to use that I don't need anything else but my keys for many errands. The slot in the back will actually hold a driver's license, a couple of credit cards, and even a folded bill (real $$, haha) and still close. The only reason I got a replacement (after about two years or so) was that the sliding door was wearing out, after much use. I love anything that makes life easier, and this product certainly does just that! And the price is right, too!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: The color was great and the first week or two this was a best case I had ever owned in my life. It didn't take long beore the slider started opening on its own with any pressure that touched it. If I had known this I would have only used it sometimes and not so often. I love cases and this has still been of of the few I was excited about.
customer_reviews.author: Jenette M Stark

customer_reviews.title: Cool cell case
customer_reviews.text: I love the color! However, that's not the best part. The best part if this cell case is the tiny/perfect sized hidden compartment on the back side of the case. It holds up to 2 cards (i.e.: drivers license-credit card) as well as 1-2 small sized receipts. Very convenient and I receive compliments on it almost everytime that I use my cell. Whoever sees the cell case tells me how cool the teal color is & people are always "wowed" by the fact that there's a hidden compartment of which I get my debit card out of. I tell them that I bought it on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy, but over all good.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my phone great, back part slides open easily and clicks back in securely. Seems a little cheap but it is a little cheap so that's expected. Not sure I would trust it if you are prone to dropping your phone on concrete floors but overall I'm very happy with my purchase. Also I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Carpenito

customer_reviews.title: Love that my cards fit in the back easily
customer_reviews.text: Love that my cards fit in the back easily, I've accidentally dropped my phone several times and nothing gets broken or goes flying, the only thing, which isn't horrible, is that my wireless charging station doesn't work with the cards in my case on my phone, so I take the phone out of the case every night, I didn't realize that was what the problem was, I thought my charger crapped out.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Card Holder
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Does fit the galaxy s6 well (does not fit s6 edge) 2. Easy access to all ports 3. Side buttons function well with case 4. Color matches description 5. Thin but sturdy Cons 1. Card holder is VERY difficult to slide back ( feels like you are about to break it eith the amount of force and effort required). Only opens halfway when it does open 2. Cheaply made stylus too light. Made of thin plastic and feels hollow and painted poorly
customer_reviews.author: Nebula88

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in May and it's durable. To A point. The plastic edges have cracked apart and I've had to super glue them back down many a times. Edit: I've actually had to make a whole new plastic piece so the card holder 'door' will stay on and not slide off. It's taken its falls, but it's not for those very active with their phones or are very clumsy. I also forgot to say that it only fits two normal sized cards (I was only able to fit my 4Front Debit, Capital One Credit cards + my Medicaid insurance card (super thin and flimsy))
customer_reviews.author: Cylver

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this piece of crap. *But the seller is awesome*
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of crap. The slot for credit cards is incredibly difficult to open. It doesn't snap shut completely. There are gaps all around the case. I'm an idiot, and already attached the popsocket that I purchased on to it. So now I'm out the money on the crappy case and the pop socket. ***Update!*** Product is still absolute crap, but the seller conatcted me after my inital review and did all they could to make it right. Crappy product. GREAT SELLER!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: ONE CARD ONLY
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby. It works. A bit too well. Very hard to open the sliding case once you get a card in there. A card. As in ONE. If you put two in there, plan on using a blow torch or a screw driver or a six-year old kid to get it open. I suppose that verifies the security of your card though. It's not gonna fall out. I guarandamntee it.
customer_reviews.author: Bekka's Kindle Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love the Case.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. It does not add to the bulk of the phone, protects it and lets me carry a couple of credit cards. I could probably get cash in also, as long as it is only 1 or 2 bills. The only problem I had is that is was very hard to slide open at first. I had to use a knife to pop it open the first few times. Once I worked it open and closed several times, it became much easier to use. Definitely worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Mintz

customer_reviews.title: This case looks great and has held up to the abuse that I ...
customer_reviews.text: This case looks great and has held up to the abuse that I put on it. The only downside is that the area to hold your ID and cards is difficult to slide open and I often have my husband slide it open for me. It can hold my ID and 2-3 credit cards. I tried to put cash in it and it didn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalTeacher

customer_reviews.title: Had it for a year and love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I've had it for a year but after numerous drops and mishandling it's time to order a new one just because it's scratched up and pretty banged up. Still works great. Never had a problem sliding it open to take out my debit card or license. Love it so much I'm ordering 2 more this time just incase. For the price lasting one year is expected.
customer_reviews.author: Solange

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this case to be super flimsy, but it was actually pretty sturdy and held on to my cell super well! I can fit my keys and my card in at the same time. The onlt issue was to start out with, the card compartment wouldnt open very easy. But after opening it over and over, it got a little easier and since it clicks closed it stays closed. Ive had this for over a week now and its still doing good. Not as cheap as youd expect for sure
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla

customer_reviews.title: perfect!
customer_reviews.text: works great! I'm a klutz and I have already dropped my phone several times since getting this case for it, and my phone is in perfect condition!! I see reviews complaining about the credit card slot being hard to open.. it is a little hard, but I think it's perfect.. it takes me a couple seconds to open, so what! at least it isn't super loose so my credit cards can fall out!
customer_reviews.author: Chris white

customer_reviews.title: I love this phone case
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case! Aside from it's attractive look, this case has a surprisingly well-built frame and shell. The case is sturdy, hard, and durable. It came with more accessories than I was expecting to get, such as: a screen protector, screen wipe, and stylus. The slide out panel was difficult to maneuver at first, but because easy once I figured out the 'sweet spot' for opening it. The panel stays shut when I'm moving my phone around, which I appreciate considering that is where my ID lives. Awesome phone case. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money, durable, good color
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone case. I bought it for my ID and debit card for the Pink concert. The only thing is the slide part is sometimes hard to open. It held my ID, debit card and a couple bills. Its definitely a value for the money The color Pink is a good color too
customer_reviews.author: Christina Pannell

customer_reviews.title: Real useful and durable
customer_reviews.text: Had the case for about 2 years now and the case is still like new, I tend to drop my phone once in a while and it's protected my phone pretty well, no damage to the phone all and love the fact that I can put my ID and credit card in the case so if I am in a rush, I can just take my phone with me and I have everything i need with me! I plan to get the same kind of case for my future phones as well.
customer_reviews.author: Asican

customer_reviews.title: It was really nice for a while
customer_reviews.text: It was really nice for a while, but then the phone dropped and the case broke. The little pocket for ID and bank card is very convenient for those who don't like carrying a purse or wallet everywhere. May reorder another, but hesitant because it didn't last that long.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Yaz

customer_reviews.title: Cute, little difficulty
customer_reviews.text: The sliding door is a bit hard to open and money has to be folded a certain way to fit but aside from that it's awesome and it's so cute. The color is just what I thought it'd be. Update 9/11/2019: I've now had this case for a while and the sliding door has broken on it. I still continue to use it, however, because it's a sturdy case and keeps my phone protected.
customer_reviews.author: Myranda Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: I like this case. It's simple, yet feels strong and protective, yet not oversized. Cover on back to open for card holder needs a little groove or lip to make sliding it open easier, especially if you don't have long nails. Otherwise great.
customer_reviews.author: kksholes

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Not too bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Like this product. My previous bling cover that cost a lot, was very heavy and bulky. I like this much better. It looks nice and I really like having my license, credit card and cash handy. Also bought phone ring that matches and have been pretty happy with both.
customer_reviews.author: Baylee

customer_reviews.title: It takes a few uses to make the door easy to open but otherwise it's pretty well so far
customer_reviews.text: I kind of regretted my color choice once it came in the mail, but that's my fault. The color matches the description and picture on the site perfectly. Other than that, I am a huge fan of the wallet pocket. It takes a few uses to make the door easy to open but otherwise it's pretty well so far.
customer_reviews.author: EMan C

customer_reviews.title: Stylus doesn’t match the case!
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of the card holder! But the tip came off the ball point stylus after 3 uses uses. Also, the stylus isn’t the same color as the case!!!! And didn’t even try to put the cheap screen protector on.
customer_reviews.author: Sy

customer_reviews.title: Really good buy
customer_reviews.text: I just got this today and out fits perfectly. I was a little skeptical about getting it because of the other reviews but for $7 it's amazing. I can fit 3 cards in out where I only need 2. The back feels like heavy duty hard plastic which will be good if I drop it. I didn't find it hard to get the case off like other reviews. The stylus is a different blue than the case but not much of a difference. The card cover has just enough resistance that it's not going to come open on its own. The screen cloth that cane with it isn't the best but overall it's a really good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alyson Hill

customer_reviews.title: This is for my wife's phone and she likes the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is for my wife's phone and she likes the case and the ID holder on the back but it sticks a lot while opening. She has had it a couple months and it is still very hard to open sometimes so that is the one thing I would change. Loosen it just a tad.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie D. Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: this is a really nice case! both in appearance and use. it can hold up to 3 cards in my experience. I haven't changed cases since buying it yet it has no visible wear on it. i will say that the card slot is somewhat hard to open, but I easily resolved that by attaching a popsocket (and currently a ring stand). it hasn't fallen apart and it doesn't look or feel very cheaply made or anything. overall it's a very nice case and is recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: dani ♡

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of the same case one black one gold. Both for the galaxy s6. The gold fit like a glove. The black is for a completely different phone despite the product description. The case did not line up with the phone's buttons and covered half my camera.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey B

customer_reviews.title: ... guess it is safe to say it is a great product each case has lasted me at least 6 ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I have reorder this case so I guess it is safe to say it is a great product each case has lasted me at least 6 months if not longer. The backing for the credit card slot is really stiff and hard to open at first but eventually loosens up. I am able to fir my debit card and ID in there perfectly it is very handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough case!
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I've knocked off a star for this case is because my sliding compartment sticks a little when trying to open it (making card retrieval a little awkward). Otherwise, the case seems really sturdy especially for having a hollow compartment! I've already dropped my phone, at least thrice, from standing height and onto tiled flooring or cement. Both my phone and case don't have any marks to show. Now, I'm just crossing my fingers that the compartment just needs a workout before opening it gets smoother.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case for about 4 months now, and it has done a fantastic job of protecting my phone from my clumsiness. It has a few small dents and scratches from me dropping my phone so much, but my phone remains in great shape. The back was, at first, a little difficult to slide open, but once you get it worn out a little bit, it starts to slide really easily; at this point, I just press and pull with my thumb and it goes in and out just fine. It's roomy enough that I can usually fit 3 cards in it.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. The compartment is a great place to secure a few dollars, identification and or credit card. I like to keep a five dollar bill for my Starbuck's run and driver's license. The color is a nice neutral color. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Delores D Montford

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to open after closure and poor customer service on return
customer_reviews.text: The fit is fine but the closure was difficult to manage. It really needs to have a place where you can push the cover easily. What makes this worst, was the fact I couldn't return this item.
customer_reviews.author: daily shopper

customer_reviews.title: Spend the extra 10 bucks on something more secure
customer_reviews.text: 1. Lets talk about the instructions. They're full of grammatical errors which makes me lose trust in the company already. 2. The case is more bulky that advertised. 3. It has a nicee overall look and feel. 4. I have not had an adequate amount of time to determine the sturdiness of this case but it seems like i got what i payed for.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Life saving
customer_reviews.text: It would be a good gift for someone always misplacing their important cards. It can hold two debit cards and my drivers license. I'm on my second one because after about 10 times of dropping it the other one finally broke.
customer_reviews.author: Ambular

customer_reviews.title: and looks very nice. The back compartment is very difficult to open ...
customer_reviews.text: Case fits the phone perfectly, protects it from falls, and looks very nice. The back compartment is very difficult to open (you really have to get your nails in there) but is very handy. I did find the screen protector difficult to remove all the bubbles, though. It was almost too stiff in places to conform to the screen. But for the price it's tough to beat.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: The case is almost impossible to open at first, so accessing any cards is horrible. Now that it finally opens when I need it to, part of the case comes apart and I have to snap it back together. Looks good though and is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: MMK

customer_reviews.title: It's decent
customer_reviews.text: If you need a temporary solution to holding a couple cards in your case, than here you go. Would not recommend long term. You can only put in maybe one or two cards before you can't shut the slide anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen L

customer_reviews.title: To open slot you must purchase extras
customer_reviews.text: I CAN NOT open the credit card slot. I purchased a pop socket and added it. I CAN NOW open the slot without a problem. I do not recommend this case unless you get a pop socket or something like it. The slot does not have a notch to help open. Other than the slot the case is great.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Horn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, buy a pop socket to go with it.
customer_reviews.text: This case lasted almost year! Very impressed, and I got compliments from multiple people whenever I pulled out cards from it in public. I will say it was only easy for me to slide the cover open and shut because I have a pop socket attached to it. Before the pop socket it was basically impossible for me to open it. But if you get a pop socket with it, you'll be happy you bought it too. It also protected my phone very well.
customer_reviews.author: Gmoney

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter likes the "secret" pocket. It worked well but after a while the pocket would open by itself. Not as durable as we would have liked. Also, when you put a pop-socket on it it made the secret pocket open too.
customer_reviews.author: refchar

customer_reviews.title: Easily Broken
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 of these cases in the past six months to easily breaking. Kept ordering these ones because they were least expensive and the style that I liked. The wallet opening is hard to open the first couple of tries.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: you cant open the back after its shut, i am a grown man i have had about 15 co-workers also try,, if we take a knife and slip it in we can open it, but after you close it, no can do opening it again unless you have a knife. and i am not pulling a knife out at a register when i want to buy some thing,, i got RIPPED OFF!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case for my Samsing 6S
customer_reviews.text: Loving this case. Exactly as described. Will hold my credit card and ID plus one bill folded. Color is a rose gold and the cut outs for charge cord, headphones and speaker are lined up perfectly. Have dropped my phone several times and haven't had a problem (knock on wood). The slide cover for cards is a bit hard to sometimes open but still love just the same
customer_reviews.author: Noopyluvr

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but only lasted 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved the Color of this case. It was extremely hard to open compartment for cards the first two months. Then it was easier but still secure. Sadly it only lasted 6 months after dropping it at restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very handy.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Looks nice. Not too difficult to open. Unfortunately I'm a dropper so I broke it really fast. If you drop your phone a lot go with a sturdier one, I guess this is just basic plastic. That said once it is well and truly broken I will probably order another cause I really like it. Holds two, mayyybe 3 cards. It's really nice for a night out when you don't want to keep track of too many things.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Connelly

customer_reviews.title: Love it but broke fast
customer_reviews.text: Looooove this phone case! It's just a bummer it broke so fast. It broke within a couple of weeks of buying it. I dropped it on the floor and one part cracked /broke. So cards can fall out now if im not careful.
customer_reviews.author: Pathy Kay

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Compliment on this case!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone compliment this phone case! The storage area is discrete and will store up to 2 cards and small amounts of cash
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: The case is fine. It fit my Samsung Galaxy 6 just fine. The light blue I thought I got was almost green. But it's fine the card slot comes out with a little pull. The screen protector it comes with was very thin, I ended up using my own. But other than that it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made all year
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, but more importantly: this case has let me whittle down my daily accessories to my phone and my key. Literally don't need anything else and I'm out the door. Space enough for my ID and two credit cards. Having one makes it easier to get them all out, but it can certainly accommodate the 2nd without too much hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Mykal Wells

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The color is more of a light brown than rose gold in person. The back cover that's supposed to hold credit cards is also REALLY hard to slide open. Like really hard. Smarter design would have put some kind of slit or finger tab on it to help it slide open. Disappointing, but that's usually what I get when I spend so little on a phone case (or anything really)
customer_reviews.author: Kim Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I had no trouble opening the card holder, but the case is very cheaply made and feels like it will break easily. It's exactly what I expected for a phone case with such a low price. It doesn't smell bad, but I'm not sure it will last the next 4 months until I upgrade my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This case is PERFECT for stashing away a couple of cards
customer_reviews.text: This case is PERFECT for stashing away a couple of cards. I leave my bus pass in here to tap into the transit system in my city. The plastic is study enough to stay closed (unless dropped from a distance) yet thin enough to still allow the card to scan through.
customer_reviews.author: Ly

customer_reviews.title: Durable and convenient!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I reordered after having my 1st one for several years. The reason I had to replace it was because I had a hard drop on concrete and a small section cracked around the slide out compartment. This case is awesome because it holds your license, credit and a little cash. I don't have to carry anything else for a quick trip to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Nice Concept
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter as she is new to having a smart phone. It is perfect as it has the extra slide to hold your license or identity card and some money.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: The case fits nicely on my phone
customer_reviews.text: The case fits nicely on my phone. The card carrier is very handy and perfect for carrying my university ID with me without needing my wallet. The sliding part itself is a softer plastic and bends easily. Hasn't given me any issues, but it would have been nice if it were a harder plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: Nice case but hard to open card holder very hard not worth buying
customer_reviews.author: Us four xoxo

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect other than the card slot
customer_reviews.text: This case is pretty much everything I was expecting it to be. A lot of people in their reviews mentioned that the card holder was a little hard to open which is very true, the back cover is a little flimsy and its hard to push open but that's my only complaint and I'm hoping it gets easier to open with time. It came with a screen protector and even a stylus which was a very nice addition so overall this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: This protected my mom's phone for a long time. The phone still looks new. The card holder seemed to not last, though.
customer_reviews.author: Taizou_950673

customer_reviews.title: Galaxy s6 case by EC
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. It came a little darker than pictured but very pretty And it will hold 3 cards and close just fine. Case is a snug fit very nice. Will consider buying another different color would love if they had a pearl white color.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: The first time i got the rose gold colour and I loved it. This time i tried a new colour ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying this case. The first time i got the rose gold colour and I loved it. This time i tried a new colour and, although I love the colour, this case is defective. The sliding wallet section does not open easily and requires excessive amounts of force. Then, when it does open, it gets jammed in that position. The first case I got worked perfectly I probably just got sent a bad one this time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid case. passable wallet for few items.
customer_reviews.text: Had this case for I'm not sure how long, but it worked well for protecting my phone. As a wallet it left a lot to be desired, even for someone like me who only used it for 2 credit cards and not really much else. Mainly I just had it for protection of my phone however and it did well in that respect for a considerable length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: WARNING DON'T BUY IF YOU HAVE A SamsungS6
customer_reviews.text: The mic jack is inaccessible because the case cut out doesn't match the s6 model. Also, sliding the back is next to impossible. I had to get a safety pin and wedge it in the opening to get it to slide
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can be a little difficult to slide open. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Can be a little difficult to slide open. I bought one of those pop socket rings and put it on the back though and that solved the problem. very convenient case.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to open
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case so I could just take my phone to the gym and use the credit card compartment for my license, however is next to impossible to open.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fig

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I like this cell cover, it's good and fit in my Samsung galaxy s6.
customer_reviews.author: Divina G. Ertel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the rose gold color. The previous reviews mentioned the door not sliding open easily and I agree. I bought a ring holder to help it slide easier and that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Returned immediately
customer_reviews.text: Did not like- felt flimsy, and the compartment was very hard to open. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: gretchen1524

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month of use.
customer_reviews.text: While I like the idea and simplicity of design, the material is flimsy and broke at the edges very soon. Also gets very hot when I do wireless charging!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: The card holder did not open and close easily. The back becomes detached with little force
customer_reviews.text: This was made of flimsy plastic. The card holder did not open and close easily. The back becomes detached with little force. I threw it in the garbage after two days, but I am sure it would have broken within a week. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: mestro

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to stash extra money inside. Ive had it for months now and no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Little Lady

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I wanted. I put my work ...
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I wanted. I put my work id in the card holder and can swipe through security with my phone. SinceI take my phone everywhere, I don't get locked out anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Jilrene

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this at a good price so I don't mind spending a little more ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about taking off my Otterbox and using this case instead but so far it has worked out for me. I was not able to use the screen protector because it was too small. I read the reviews so this was not a surprise to me. I purchased this at a good price so I don't mind spending a little more money on this. My daughter decided to order one after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cecelia

customer_reviews.title: Wallet case
customer_reviews.text: Love the look. Difficult to open the credit card/drivers license holder. Not functional for me. I'm concerned I'll get to the check out and not be able to get to my credit card. Of course, what did I expect for that price.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I love the convenience of having my ID and card with me and not having to always carry my wallet. Only reason I give it 4 stars and not 5 is because it is a little hard to get the card out from the case. Other than that, I love it! I've dropped my phone a few times and so far the case has held up.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one a year ago and it finally broke. So I purchased this as a replacement since I don't know exactly what brand I had. This is so interior. The door on the back doesn't stay closed and is no where near sturdy. There is better out there. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great case but...
customer_reviews.text: Love this case, it is heavy duty and protects my phone, but the compartment on the back is hard to open. I get that you need to have it secure for holding your card or whatever else you put inside but it takes some finagling to get it back open.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Drozak

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! The color is spot on
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! The color is spot on, it holds 3 cards just fine. It makes my S6 feel more solid. I'm just a little bummed because the picture for this shows a stylus pen, but it didn't come with it. It did come with a screen protector, but I was more so looking forward to the applicator since I downloaded a cool app called "Animation Desk" where you can draw and make it come to life haha. Anyways, the case itself is great otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This Case Saved My Phone!
customer_reviews.text: This case works wonderfully. I accidentally dropped my phone inside a tub of Cream of Soup at my workplace cafeteria and my phone worked fine. The case kept it safe from any liquid getting inside. So no need to shop around pick a color and purchase this well designed case. TWO HUGE THUMBS UP!
customer_reviews.author: Mama

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: It was a little hard to open at first but not anymore. Good quality. Can hold 2-3 cards. Can be a bit of a pain to get out cards sometimes, as you have to use your nail. But overall content with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MelTheSquirrelLover

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw.
customer_reviews.text: The case itself seems like it's going to be sturdy. The wallet portion needs some work. There's no grip so I struggle Every time to slide it open. Also, no more than 1 card. It gets bulky after the second card and looks like it will break off. WORST, getting the cards out is so annoying. You have to dump all the cards out to find the one you want. Design needs some work. Came with a stylus.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: The screen protector does not fit a Galaxy S6. I've yet to drop the case and have had it for just over 2 weeks and it's already broken after just being in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to minimize purse contents
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case so I didn't have to take my purse to clubs when I dance. It works great.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Wallet phone case ... so so
customer_reviews.text: The back is a little hard to open. I have put my credit/debit card in the back. The phone seemed to get hot so I took them out. If I do use it for my credit/debit, I make sure the magnetic strip is facing up instead of against the battery of the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Mellie

customer_reviews.title: Hard plastic cover.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good looking cover and it's get a sliding feature in the back to carry your cards or a little cash. The material is a harder plastic than I anticipated but it's easy to install and it fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Jimreaper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Holds a credit card and 2 loose keys no problem
customer_reviews.author: Ben G.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: At first it was hard to open the card holder, but after a few weeks it slides perfectly. I can hold two cards and a couple of folded up dollar bills. RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: 9/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've dropped this case a million times on concrete (accidentally of course) and it's only gotten a couple small scratches and the card case is a tiny bit loose. Nothing terrible. I've had three of these cases and I've loved them all. I'm extremely rough with phones and this case has saved them.
customer_reviews.author: Lennox

customer_reviews.title: Good phone case
customer_reviews.text: Was what I was looking for. It is a little difficult to open at times, but I would rather have that then it possibly opening up on its own. If you are looking for a basic case that can hold 2 cards, this is a good one to consider.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Van

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! The blue is a little darker in person, which I don't mind because it's closer to my favorite color. The card slot is a little difficult to open, but I like it that way. I'd rather look like an idiot trying to get my card out of my phone than have the slot open on its own and my cards disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: BREAKS EASILY
customer_reviews.text: This broke within a month or so of having it, the back completely snapped in various places and was not able to hold my cards or stay attached to the rest of the case. This was my second case I had which was exactly like this. Originally I thought maybe it was just the fault of the first case but they were both very cheap and easily broke.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: good idea...
customer_reviews.text: The sliding door broke within couple weeks. Get what you pay for...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Case For The Price
customer_reviews.text: I've dropped my phone a couple times and it's still intact. I can fit three cards in the slide. I had to get a grip for the back because it is a bit slippery.
customer_reviews.author: STEAMY07

product_meta.title: Elegant Choise Compatible with Galaxy S6 Case, Samsung Galaxy S6 Wallet Case, Hybrid High Impact Resistant Protective Shockproof Hard Shell with Card Holder Slot Cover Compatible for Samsung S6(Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black
Elegancase Card Holder Wallet Case for Samsung Galaxy S6 

- Wallet Case: Wallet + protective case, practical and convenient for daily use, can carry 2 cards(ID/credit card/cash). 
- Construction: Hard PC + Soft Rubber bumper provide the best protection and prevent scratch. 
- Good user experience: Smooth touch feeling and quite easy to clean with the card slots. 
- Front Protection: Front raised lip protects Samsung Galaxy S6 from scratch/stains when facing the screen down. Please use a shatterproof tempered glass (sold separately) for more protection. 

- Warm Tip: 

- The color might be different (Daker or Lighter) on different PC monitors after tested. 

Package Includes: 

-1x Wallet + Protective Case for Samsung Galaxy S6 (Case only, cell phone is not included) 
-1 x Clear Screen Protector 
-1 x Ball-Pointed Stylus
feature_bullets: Compatibility: Slide-able card holder case for Samsung Galaxy S6, Card slot for 2 cards(ID/credit card/cash)
Elegant Hybrid Case for Galaxy S6: High impact resistant/scratch-proof rubber case + shockproof hard PC cover protects your phone from scratches,drops
Convenient & Safety: Sliding back door to keep the cards and money stay inside of the case; to close the back door securely, push it back hardly till you feel a clik
Full degree of protection: covers all four corners and includes raised edges and a TPU lip to keep the screen from scratching or touching the ground
Perfect Fit:Precise cutting for all ports, camera and speaker, side button with Full cover protection, convenient access to all functions
